page.title: 19INDUSTRY AND EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Industry in Braintree has suffered during recent years with Courtauld's Textile Mill closing in 1980.This meant a loss of many jobs and future employment prospects. The main industrial development is situated around East Street and sur- rounding roads.Crittall Windows and Lake and Elliots are the larger firms both being involved in metal manufacturing.Nearby Charrington Coal Offices and yard occupy a sizeable piece of land off Railway Street. Charrington have been in Braintree for over a 100 years but in recent years have seen a reduction in buisness. The rest of the Industrial estate is of a varied nature with light industrial units and small manufacturing firm.
